Name: Deathroids
About the game: Deathroids is a vertical scrolling shoot 'em up with amazing gameplay experience. With a sci-fi theme, the game takes place in the distant future where a horde of alien robots are on their way to destroy planet Earth and you need to pilot the B.L.I.T. Battle Laser Interception Transport to stop them. The game has simple mechanics, where the player must pass through several waves of enemies without touching them and without being shot obviously, because there is no life bar. 80's arcade style, the game has a good variety of enemies, consequently challenges of pure skill. With a soundtrack produced exclusively for the game, Deathroids has all the elements for good fun.
